name: specif-viewer
description: An app for your web-browser to view, edit* and transform system specifications.

scripts.open_browser_macos: open ./build/views/view.html || echo 'Could not open Safari browser. Please open ./build/view.html manually.'
scripts.open_browser_linux: xdg-open ./build/views/view.html || echo 'Could not open XDG browser. Please open ./build/view.html manually.'
scripts.open_browser_win: explorer './build/views/view.html' || echo 'Could not open default browser. Please open ./build/view.html manually.'
scripts._postbuild: npm run _copy_assets_folder & npm run _copy_config_folder & npm run _copy_views_folder
